questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source A. Do you think the cartoonist is a supporter of Singapore's foreign talent policy? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Sources B and C. Having read Source B, are you surprised by Source C? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source D. Can you trust what it says? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source E. What can you tell from this source? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source F. How useful is this source in aiding your understanding of the foreign talent policy in Singapore? Explain your answer.
